main_features.description: Automated web scraping of EU call for tenders using Scrapy framework.
Administration of PostgreSQL database using Adminer tool.
REST API endpoints for accessing and managing call for tenders data.
Modern dashboard for monitoring system status, scraping statistics, and convocatoria results.

corrective_actions.description: Expected an indented block after function definition on line 31.
corrective_actions.solution: Fix indentation error by adding proper indentation to the block of code under the @app.on_event('shutdown') decorator.
